alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:42AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Shelby Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1242 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Arlington, or 14 miles south of Covington, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Mason, Gallaway, Braden, Lambert, Gainesville, Hickory Withe, Belmont, Longtown and Griffen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
